content.author: vitalikbuterin
content.content:
What Ethereum needs is a lot of young blood who shared the cypherpunk vision. 

All OGs are jaded. 

It’s on the next generation now.

summary: Vitalik Buterin, co-founder of Ethereum, expressed on Twitter the need for new, younger participants in the Ethereum community who align with the cypherpunk ethos. He suggests that the original members (OGs) have become disillusioned, implying that the future of Ethereum relies on the next generation to carry forward its vision. This sentiment highlights a broader theme in the crypto space where innovation and fresh perspectives are seen as vital for ongoing development and adherence to foundational principles.
